name: The Divide (_Agoras_)
description:
The Divide

This is a specifically 2 player game playable with two Xbox 360 Controllers or WASD and the arrow keys. You need to connect across the divide to solve this timed platformer. Keep in mind there is a double jump.

Credits:

Josh Hickey-Patriquin

This is my Extra Credits Game Jame #4 " Connect" game.  Enjoy.
